name: 旅行恋恋 ~ Koishi Navigation
description: Woke up in the cabin, and said good morning to the sister who was dependent on each other, and went out in a lost way, heading for the far away who didn't know the end point - yes, she is Koishi Komeiji.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Arbitrary Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Normal Sound Card Additional Notes: Software requires Microsoft. NET Framework version 4.7.2 and above, which will be downloaded automatically.
